prompt: Make a website for a institute that primarily focuces on coding, development and DSA.
refinedPrompt: Create a website for CodeMasters Institute, an educational institution that specializes in teaching coding, software development, and data structures and algorithms (DSA). The website should have a modern, professional design with easy navigation. Include sections for course offerings, faculty profiles, student testimonials, and a blog featuring coding tips and industry insights. Implement a user-friendly course registration system and a contact form for inquiries. Optimize the website for search engines and ensure it is responsive across various devices.
